app.title: JobShaman
app.try_adjust_filters: Try adjusting your filters or search term.
app.backend_wake_desc: This can take a moment - I‚Äôm checking whether the server is out of bed. I‚Äôll retry automatically.
app.near_matches_banner_desc: Your active constraints are strict, so we‚Äôre showing offers with the smallest trade-offs.

constraint_compromise.label: Trade-off:
constraint_compromise.net_below: Net income is {{amount}} below your minimum
constraint_compromise.net_unknown: Net income cannot be reliably estimated

filters.radius_hint_no_location: To use radius, enter a city or use your current location.

financial.unlock_desc: Log in and find out how much you really have left in your wallet after taxes and commute.
financial.unlock_commute_address: To unlock commute reality, you must fill in your address in your profile.
financial.missing_address: We are missing a starting point
financial.set_address_desc: Set your address in your profile so we can calculate commute time and costs.
financial.benefit_info_desc: Estimate based on average market values. Real value may vary.

methodology.title: How JHI and transport are calculated
methodology.jhi_formula: Percent change in income from commute √ó 1.5 = JHI points
methodology.jhi_example: Example: If commute reduces income by 1%, JHI drops by ~1.5 points
methodology.final_formula: Net base + Benefits - Commute = Real Income
methodology.jhi_desc: A numeric index that measures the "health" of a job offer. It is calculated from multiple factors:
methodology.pillar_financial_desc: How salary + benefits - commute affects your total income
methodology.pillar_time_desc: How commuting and work type (remote/hybrid/on-site) affects your free time
methodology.pillar_mental_desc: Words like "fast-paced", "stress" or "high pressure" reduce the score
methodology.pillar_growth_desc: Training, courses and education increase the score
methodology.jhi_example_long: Example: If commute reduces net income by 1%, JHI drops by ~1.5 points. Capped to -20 to +15 points.
methodology.transport_desc: The system uses your preferred transport and applies the lowest cost option:

financial.reality_desc: Calculation of net income and commuting costs.

job_detail.jhi_missing_salary_hint: Low JHI is caused by missing salary in the listing.
job_detail.cv_ai_tools_title: AI CV tools for this role
job_detail.cv_ai_tools_desc: Optimize your CV for this specific listing and improve ATS readability before you apply.
job_detail.cv_ai_tools_upgrade_hint: Premium unlocks CV optimization, ATS improvements, and AI CV dictation.
job_detail.cv_ai_tools_missing_cv: Add your CV in profile first to run optimization.

job_detail.cv_ai_tools_save_failed: Saving to profile failed. Please try again.

transparency_card.title: Brutal Transparency
transparency_card.badge_why_title: Why do you see the EU Transparent badge?
transparency_card.badge_why_desc: From June 2026, salary ranges will be mandatory in the EU. At JobShaman, we believe your time is valuable already today. Companies with this badge play fair and openly show compensation first.

apply.title: Apply to {{company}}

apply.submitting_desc: Encrypting personal data and verifying attachments.

apply.followup_desc: Did you respond to the position {{title}} at {{company}}?

auth.login_desc: Log in to access your profile.
auth.register_desc: Start your career journey with JobShaman.
auth.email_confirm_notice_title: Please confirm your email before signing in
auth.email_confirm_notice_body: If you just registered, confirm your email from the message we sent you.
auth.confirmation_required: Thanks for signing up! Please confirm your email to continue. After confirmation, log in and onboarding will appear.

logistics.title: Commute Logistics
logistics.relocation_desc: This position requires moving or being a digital nomad.
logistics.too_far_desc: Distance {{distance}} km is impractical for daily commuting.
logistics.unknown_location_desc: System was unable to determine the location accurately.

welcome.subtitle: Find work that makes sense ‚Äî with transparent pay, benefits, and AI analysis.

subtitle_items: Gross pay lies. How much do you really keep?
The offer looks great. But what will it cost you each month?
Benefits aren‚Äôt just meal vouchers. What truly matters to you?
Why should your search stop where the map ends?
page_hero.try_free_btn: Sign up to unlock all features

benefits_carousel.jhi_desc: Reveal toxic companies before you send your CV.
benefits_carousel.salary_desc: AI estimates salary even where companies hide it.
benefits_carousel.commute_desc: We calculate your lost time and money.
benefits_carousel.coach_desc: Improves your CV and writes a cover letter for you.

page_what_is.desc_1: JobShaman is not a job portal. It's not a career coach. It's not an AI that writes your cover letter.
page_what_is.desc_2: JobShaman is math. It's reality. It's your net income after deducting taxes, insurance and commute costs.
page_what_is.desc_3: We manually analyze every job offer. We evaluate the real impact on your life ‚Äî not just what the company wanted to write.
page_what_is.card_1_desc: No guessing. Every job is analyzed according to clear criteria.
page_what_is.card_2_desc: You see all calculations. Nothing happens in a black box.
page_what_is.card_3_desc: Algorithms where data exists. AI where there is no other solution.
page_what_is.desc_4: We are the only portal that analyzes a user's profile based on skills and can offer a suitable course to improve their position in the labor market or to get their dream job.

page_mobile.desc_1: On mobile? JobShaman now offers Tinder-like swiping to browse jobs effortlessly.
page_mobile.desc_2: Swipe left to pass, swipe right to save. One job at a time. No endless scrolling. No information overload.
page_mobile.desc_3: See your progress with a beautiful counter and progress bar. When you're done, get a summary of what you've reviewed and how many you saved.
page_mobile.swipe_desc: Swipe left to pass on a job, swipe right to save it. Simple, fast, and feels natural.
page_mobile.mobile_desc: Automatically enabled on mobile and tablet devices. The desktop layout is still available when you need it.
page_mobile.progress_desc: See which job you're on, a progress bar, and completion stats. Stay motivated as you browse.
page_mobile.tip_text: Tap the job card to view full details in the expanded view. You can still access all your filters and saved jobs from the top menu.

reality_showcase.title: Financial and commute reality
reality_showcase.subtitle: Even a lower gross salary can end up better financially.
reality_showcase.home_office_note: Time and money stay with you.

welcome.ai_analysis_desc: AI quality analysis and signal breakdown
welcome.eu_transparent_desc: Salary range transparency aligned with upcoming EU rules.
welcome.office_dog_remote: Office dog in a remote-first ad
welcome.transparency_desc: Data from JobShaman AI + public sources

cross_border.headline: Work doesn't stop at borders. Why should your search?
cross_border.body_1: Living in Rybnik, but Ostrava is closer than Katowice? Most job portals stop looking exactly where the state ends.
cross_border.body_2: In JobShaman, we search by reality, not by the map. Thanks to geospatial analysis, we show offers within commuting distance, even across borders.
cross_border.cta: Single switch unlocks cross-border search. Verified offers only.

methodology.title: Shaman Formula V1.2
methodology.financial_desc: Salary, bonuses, transparency and spread of offers.
methodology.time_desc: Type of contract, remote/hybrid and time lost to commuting.
methodology.mental_desc: Toxicity of the ad, stress factors and health support.
methodology.growth_desc: Learning budget, mentoring and career path.
methodology.values_desc: Personal fit with culture and meaning.
methodology.penalty_desc: Overall JHI is the average of the five pillars shown in the chart. Weights are already reflected in the pillar values, with no hidden penalties.

jhi.title: JHI Preferences
jhi.explainer: Set what matters to you most. Higher percentage means stronger impact on your final score.
jhi.weights_auto_normalized: Note: weights are auto-normalized, so they work even if total is not exactly 100%.

ai_guide.title: AI Resume Guide
ai_guide.helper: The more details you provide, the more accurate the output will be. You can skip a step and return later.
ai_guide.reminder_title: Quick checklist so you do not forget anything:
ai_guide.speech_unavailable: Speech dictation is not available in this browser.
ai_guide.empty_step: This step is still empty. That is okay.

errors.fill_one_step: Please fill in at least one guide step.
errors.generate_failed: AI guide failed. Please try again.
errors.save_failed: Saving to profile failed. Please try again.

early_story.title: Beginning of your story (childhood, school, dreams)
early_story.hint: What were your early interests? What was your dream school/field and how did it turn out? Include it even if your path changed.

activities.title: Leisure and volunteering activities
activities.hint: Scouts, team sports, clubs, volunteering, organizing events. What did these give you for work and collaboration?

first_work.title: First work experience and part-time jobs
first_work.hint: Try to recall all jobs and part-time work. What was useful and what did not work? Even a bad experience matters.

career_shifts.title: Career jumps and field changes
career_shifts.hint: Did you switch to another field? What led to it and what did you transfer from previous roles?

projects_impact.title: Projects, results, and strengths
projects_impact.hint: What are you proud of? Add concrete outcomes. Which skills and strengths should AI extract from this?

personality_preferences.title: Personality, values, and work preferences
personality_preferences.hint: Are you more introvert or extrovert? Which environment fits you (pace, team, autonomy, remote/hybrid, stability vs change)?

why.inferred_skills: AI inferred {{count}} hidden skills from your story and activities.
why.skills_normalized: Key skills were consolidated into a clear list for ATS and recruiters.
why.work_structured: Work experience was structured into role, company, period, and impact.
why.education_normalized: Education was normalized into a consistent format for better readability.
why.summary_condensed: The summary was condensed into a quick-scan version for profile and CV headline.
why.cv_fulltext: The full AI CV text combines your inputs with emphasis on transferable strengths.
why.better_with_context: Output is more accurate because the guide had enough context across areas.

seo.base_title: JobShaman - Career OS for smarter work
seo.home_description: Career OS that reveals hidden skills, raises market value, and delivers transparent job offers with real salaries, benefits and JHI score.
seo.profile_description: AI profile, hidden skills, strengths and personalized job recommendations.
seo.company_dashboard_description: Publish job ads and analyze candidates with AI. JobShaman for companies - modern recruitment with transparency and data.
seo.job_detail_description: Details for position {{title}} at {{company}}. Salary: {{salary}}. Location: {{location}}. Benefits: {{benefits}}.
seo.home_description_simple: AI that reads between the lines.
seo.ai_summary_home: JobShaman is a Career OS that uncovers hidden skills, increases market value, and delivers transparent job offers with real salaries and JHI score.
seo.ai_summary_job: Details for position {{title}} at {{company}}. Offer {{salary}} at location {{location}}. Benefits include: {{benefits}}.
seo.ai_summary_company: JobShaman for companies allows publishing job ads, candidate analysis with AI and transparent recruitment processes.
seo.ai_summary_default: JobShaman - modern platform for job seekers in Czechia with AI analysis and transparency.

portal.title: Company Portal
portal.subtitle: Recruitment without the gloss, data without bias.

dashboard.subtitle: Statistics for the whole company and individual recruiters.

ad_editor.fill_required: Please fill in both the position name and description.
ad_editor.publish_success: The ad has been sent for review and will be published soon!

assessments_tab.desc: Create and manage AI assessments for candidates.

candidates.no_candidates_desc: Once you publish an offer, candidate profiles with calculated match scores will start appearing here.

seo.home_description: Career OS with AI profile and hidden-skill discovery.
seo.services_description: Tools and services to grow your market value.
seo.saved_description: Your list of saved job offers and favorites.
seo.profile_description: AI profile, hidden skills and personalized recommendations.
seo.ai_summary_home: JobShaman is a Career OS that uncovers hidden skills and increases market value.
seo.ai_summary_services: Career services and tools for growth on JobShaman.
seo.ai_summary_profile: Profile with AI enrichment and hidden skills.

metrics.impact_desc: This is work broken down into impacts.

financial.title: Financial Reality
financial.desc: How much you really have left each month. After taxes, mandatory deductions, and commuting costs.
financial.hint: No 'up to 60,000 CZK'. Just net income in the real world.

commute.title: Commute Impact
commute.desc: Commuting is not just distance. It's time, money, fatigue, and long-term impact on life.

jhi.title: JHI ‚Äì Job Happiness Index
jhi.desc: One number that summarizes five dimensions of work life: income, time, stability, flexibility, and load.
jhi.hint: Inspiration comes from Bhutan's Gross National Happiness index. We don't rate companies. We rate the impact of work on the person.

transparency.title: Transparency Score
transparency.desc: Some ads are fair. Others are just well-written.
transparency.hint: We analyze language, ambiguities, and missing information. The less fog, the higher the score.

activity.added_comment: {{name}} added a comment to {{target}}
activity.no_redux: Looks promising, but lacks experience with Redux.

hero.tagline: Hire for character. Skills can be taught.
hero.value_prop_detail: Recommendations use real candidate behavior and skill fit, not only how the CV is written.
hero.trust: No inflated promises. Clear metrics and explainable recommendations.

stats.title: Market Reality
stats.subtitle: EU/UK benchmarks used as a proxy for CZ market.

cards.avg_time_fill_eu_title: Average time to fill in the EU
cards.avg_time_fill_uk_title: Time to fill in the UK
cards.eu_labor_cost_title: Average labor cost per hour in the EU

calculator.title: Calculate your impact
calculator.subtitle: 5 inputs are enough to estimate yearly time and cost savings.
calculator.note: Conservative model: counts only screening time and uses 26% faster hiring as a proxy; job board cost assumes 30 days per month.

benefits.conversion_without_assessment: Better conversion and response relevance even without AI assessments
benefits.skill_discovery: Skill discovery instead of strict keyword filtering
benefits.explainable_relevance: See why each candidate is relevant
benefits.measurable_funnel: Measurable funnel from view to response
benefits.relevance: Relevance over chance ‚Äî shortlist that fits the role
benefits.transparency: Transparent decisions ‚Äî clear reasons for recommendations
benefits.hidden_talents: Hidden talent ‚Äî candidates ATS would miss

assessment.title: AI Assessment Center
assessment.desc: Intelligent candidate evaluation using AI analysis of responses, skills and cultural fit

analysis.title: Candidate Analysis
analysis.desc: Detailed candidate profiling including turnover risk analysis and team compatibility

optimization.title: AI Ad Optimization
optimization.desc: Automatic improvement of job ad text for maximum attractiveness and reaching higher quality candidates

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.desc: Detailed overviews of ad effectiveness, candidate demographics and recruitment costs

transparent.title: Transparency and Fair Play
transparent.desc: Verification of information in ads and elimination of deceptive practices in recruitment

posting.title: Ad Management
posting.desc: Simple creation and publishing of job ads with formatting, emojis, and benefit selection.

insights.title: Benefit Insights
insights.desc: Find out which benefits candidates value most and tailor your offer.

dashboard.title: Usage Overview
dashboard.desc: Track the usage of AI optimizations and assessments within your subscription.

pricing.title: Pricing Plans
pricing.promo_hint: * Starting price for the project beginning

professional_pro.desc: For larger hiring teams with analytics needs.
professional_pro.name: Professional

trust_block.title: No empty promises
trust_block.text: Every recommendation is explainable and auditable.

cta.subtitle: Try JobShaman on your first role for free and compare results with your current hiring.

ats_problem.ats_p1: Candidates drop out because of CV wording, not ability.
ats_problem.ats_p2: HR spends hours sorting irrelevant applications.
ats_problem.ats_p3: ATS cannot explain why it recommended a candidate.
ats_problem.ats_result: Result: hiring slows down and selection quality drops.
ats_problem.js_title: JobShaman analyzes fit instead of filtering
ats_problem.js_p1: Skills in role context, not in isolation.
ats_problem.js_p2: Real candidate behavior in the process.
ats_problem.js_result: Each recommendation includes an explanation ‚Äî not an anonymous score.

solution.title: The system evaluates
solution.subtitle: Concrete signals instead of keyword matches.
solution.pillar_skill_desc: We evaluate skills against the role, not CV phrasing.
solution.pillar_relevance_desc: We consider responses, activity, and context.
solution.pillar_measure_desc: We compare requirements and profiles at the skill level.

risk.title: Risk of inaction
risk.text: Each day a role stays open is a direct financial loss and a drag on team performance.

faq.title: FAQ for companies
faq.q1: How can you be cheaper and still more relevant?
faq.a1: We optimize for quality responses, not for maximum volume of random applications.
faq.q2: What if a candidate does not have a perfect CV?
faq.a2: We evaluate skills and context of experience. CV style is not the main signal.
faq.q3: How do you measure response quality?
faq.a3: We track impressions, detail opens, responses, and other funnel signals.
faq.q4: Does it work without AI assessment?
faq.a4: Yes. Better relevance and conversion already come from core matching and behavior signals.
faq.q5: How do you handle data protection?
faq.a5: We use controlled data access and transparent logging of key recommendation steps.

trust.i1: Transparent pricing with no hidden fees
trust.i2: Measurable funnel from impression to response
trust.i3: Relevant responses even without AI assessment

step1.info_box: These details are used to verify your company. Ads from verified companies have higher priority and reach.

post1.title: How to spot a toxic company?

post2.title: Transparency in Recruitment 2026
post2.excerpt: New EU transparency directive changes the game. See which companies are furthest ahead.

post3.title: AI as your career coach
post3.excerpt: How to effectively use Career Pathfinder and AI analysis to move forward in your career path.

skillsGap.benefit_2_desc: Improve salary potential with in-demand skills
skillsGap.benefit_3_desc: Certificates that recruiters actually search for

welcome_v2.legacy_fallback_title: A career guide built for outcomes
welcome_v2.legacy_fallback_desc: Start the AI guide and discover roles that match your real story.

hero.subheadline: An AI guide for any profession. It understands your story, not just your job title.

problem_first.line1: Stuck in a job you do not enjoy?
problem_first.line2: AI shows paths you cannot see yet.

aspiration_first.line2: AI finds jobs you would not search for.

hero.live_stats: Currently {{jobs_count}} active jobs, {{analyzed_count}} jobs analyzed for JHI today.

step1.title: 1. Tell your story
step1.desc: Text or voice. Talk like to a friend.

step2.title: 2. AI analyzes
step2.desc: It finds skills you have but do not put in your CV.

demo.title: Try it now (demo mode)
demo.subtitle: No signup. See how AI reads your story.
demo.default_text: For the last 7 years I've worked as a driver. Every day I plan routes, communicate with clients, and handle unexpected situations. I enjoy organizing and working with people.
demo.placeholder: Write your story or edit the pre-filled text‚Ä¶

proof.title: What AI found in real people

cards.name: Peter, 39
cards.context: Delivery driver, wanted a more stable schedule.
cards.quote: For the first time I saw my experience could be used in another role.

cards.name: Lucy, 31
cards.context: Nurse, looking for a sustainable change.
cards.quote: I finally got a direction that makes sense long term.

cards.name: Mark, 44
cards.context: Manufacturing shift worker, wanted career growth.
cards.quote: This was practical guidance, not generic advice.

rows.career_os: AI searches by who you are

final_cta.title: See what AI can detect in you
final_cta.privacy: Your story is private. AI analyzes it; sensitive data is not stored in observability logs.
final_cta.beta: Beta: Early users get premium features free for 6 months.

anti_ats.title: Why this works differently from typical HR filters
anti_ats.ats_desc: They often look for reasons to reject candidates, mostly by strict keyword and template matching.
anti_ats.career_os_desc: It looks for potential and transferable strengths, not only template fit.
anti_ats.quote: We use AI to give people a fair chance and show their real market value.

assessment_creator.limit_reached: You have reached the limit of {{limit}} assessments for your current plan. Upgrade for more assessments.
assessment_creator.title: Competency Generator
assessment_creator.subtitle: AI creates scenarios to verify real capabilities.
assessment_creator.auto_fill_hint: Selecting a job ad lets AI auto-fill role and key skills.
assessment_creator.skills_placeholder: e.g. React, Performance Optimization, System Design
assessment_creator.extracting_skills: Analyzing job ad and extracting skills...

structure_items.1: Expert "Quick-fire" (5-8 tasks) - knowledge of procedures, tools and standards.
structure_items.2: Situational tasks (SJT) (2-3 scenarios) - behavior in real situations.
structure_items.3: Practical Case Study (1 task) - realistic job sample tailored to the role.
structure_items.4: Logic & Analysis (1-2 tasks) - prioritization and data interpretation.

assessment_creator.structure_note: The composition adapts automatically to the role profile (from surgeon to production planner).
assessment_creator.question: Question
assessment_creator.send_hint: You can send this test to a candidate as a "Pre-screen challenge".
assessment_creator.empty_state: Enter role and skills on the left to generate tailored verification questions.

car.3: Best for: long-distance commutes, rural areas

public.title: Public transport
public.7: Best for: large cities with good transit, low stress

bike.3: Best for: distances up to 15 km

walk.4: Benefits: cheapest, healthiest, no environmental impact

metro_notes.1: ‚Ä¢ Passes/cards: public transport in major cities (Prague, Brno) offers monthly passes with unlimited rides
metro_notes.2: ‚Ä¢ Subsidies: some companies support employee transport (benefits), reducing costs
metro_notes.3: ‚Ä¢ Combined commuting: you can combine public transport with bike-sharing
metro_notes.4: ‚Ä¢ E-scooters: available in cities, cost around 5-10 CZK/km

commute_breakdown.calculation_info: How is it calculated? All costs above are one-way. The system automatically accounts for round trip (√ó2), recalculates daily/monthly/annual costs and includes monthly transit passes.

faq.renewal_q: What happens when my subscription renews?
faq.renewal_a: Your subscription renews automatically on the date shown in your dashboard. Your payment method on file will be charged. You can pause or cancel anytime.
faq.pause_a: Yes. You can pause your subscription to keep your data without billing. Contact support to pause for up to 3 months.
faq.plan_contents_q: What is included in each plan?
faq.plan_free: Free: Limited access to jobs, basic features
faq.plan_business: Professional: Unlimited assessments, unlimited postings, priority support
faq.plan_bundle: Assessment bundle: 50 one-time assessments valid for 12 months
faq.rollover_a: No. Monthly credits reset on renewal day. Assessment bundle purchases remain valid for 12 months from purchase.
faq.support_a: Email us at support@jobshaman.cz or use the in-app chat widget. Business users get 24/7 priority support.
faq.plan_basic_v2: Basic: 5 job posts, 5 AI assessments, basic matching.
faq.plan_professional_v2: Professional: 20 job posts, 50 AI assessments, JHI insights.

company_benefits.shared_credits: ‚úì Shared assessment credits across the team
company_benefits.priority_support: ‚úì Priority support and dedicated account manager

quick_info.renewal: What happens on renewal? Subscription auto-renews and your payment method is charged.
quick_info.pause: Can it be paused? Yes, contact support to pause for up to 3 months.
quick_info.credits: Unused credits? Monthly credits reset; bundles are valid for 12 months.

what_are.title: What are cookies?
what_are.description: Cookies are small text files stored in your browser when you visit our website. We use them for the following purposes:

uses.keep_login: Keeping you logged in and maintaining your session state
uses.analyze_usage: Analyzing how you use our services
uses.personalize_content: Personalizing content and ads relevant to your interests

necessary.title: Necessary cookies
necessary.session_desc: Keep you logged in while using the website
necessary.security_desc: Protect against CSRF attacks and security threats
necessary.functional_desc: Provide core features such as cart and preference storage

analytics.title: Analytics cookies
analytics.ga_desc: Help us understand how visitors use the site
analytics.hotjar_desc: Records user behavior to improve UI/UX

marketing.title: Marketing cookies
marketing.remarketing_desc: Personalized ads based on your activity

management.title: Cookie management
management.banner_desc: You can change your settings anytime
management.blocking_desc: You can block cookies in your browser at any time. Please note that blocking necessary cookies may affect some parts of the website.
management.deleting_desc: Deleting cookies removes all saved data from your browser. You will need to sign in again.

third_party.title: Third-party cookies
third_party.description: Some parts of our website may use cookies from external partners (e.g. LinkedIn, Google, etc.). These cookies are governed by the privacy policies of those third parties.

updates.title: Policy updates
updates.description: This cookie policy was last updated on {{date}}. Any changes will be published on this page and, for major changes, also sent by email to registered users.
